001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModelDefinition;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.INamedModelInstance;
006import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
007
008import java.util.stream.Stream;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012public interface IModelNodeItem<D extends IModelDefinition, I extends INamedModelInstance>
013    extends IDefinitionNodeItem<D, I> {
014
015  @Override
016  int getPosition();
017
018  /**
019   * {@inheritDoc}
020   * <p>
021   * The parent can be an assembly or a document (in the case of a root assembly.
022   */
023  @Override
024  INodeItem getParentNodeItem();
025
026  @Override
027  IAssemblyNodeItem getParentContentNodeItem();
028
029  @Override
030  @NonNull
031  default Stream<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> descendantOrSelf() {
032    return ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.concat(Stream.of(this), descendant()));
033  }
034
035  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CompareObjectsWithEquals")
036  @Override
037  @NonNull
038  default Stream<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> followingSibling() {
039    IModelNodeItem<?, ?> parent = getParentContentNodeItem();
040    return ObjectUtils.notNull(parent == null
041        ? Stream.empty()
042        : parent.modelItems()
043            // need to use != vs !Object.equals to ensure we are matching the same object
044            .dropWhile(item -> this != item)
045            .skip(1));
046  }
047
048  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CompareObjectsWithEquals")
049  @Override
050  @NonNull
051  default Stream<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> precedingSibling() {
052    IModelNodeItem<?, ?> parent = getParentContentNodeItem();
053    return ObjectUtils.notNull(parent == null
054        ? Stream.empty()
055        // need to use != vs !Object.equals to ensure we are matching the same object
056        : parent.modelItems().takeWhile(item -> this != item));
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  default Stream<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> following() {
061    return followingSibling()
062        .flatMap(IModelNodeItem::descendantOrSelf);
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  default Stream<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> preceding() {
067    return precedingSibling()
068        .flatMap(IModelNodeItem::descendantOrSelf);
069  }
070}
